item.title: Thomas Tiveron
item.author: thomas@tiveron.ca (Thomas Tiveron)
item.description: I love applying technology to traditional fields, providing eloquent solutions to complex problems! I NEVER waste an opportunity to learn, and have been leveraging my engineering mindset to quickly develop new skills every chance that I get + whatever I can squeeze in on a Sunday :p From server room design, HVAC and electrical planning, to server administration, and software development, both life-cycle management and programming, I am always up for a challenge.
